author: elena
msg: Add current node field to the wrapper. This field can be set by other components, such as
DOMNormalizer, to point to the current node in process.

author: sandygao
msg: Fixing bugs [11004] [11016] and [11017]. They are all the same.
It appears that the JLS requires every single-line-comment (//)
to be terminated by an end-of-line sequence. 3 Xerces files had this problem.
One was fixed by Neil in his previous commit. I'm fixing the other 2.

author: neilg
msg: ensure that all our files have an @version field placed consistently above the beginning of the class.

author: sandygao
msg: Report an error when non-whitespace characters appear in
schema elements other than xs:appinfo or xs:documentation.
Only these 2 elements have mixed content; all others are element-only.

author: sandygao
msg: A new message for the error where non-whitespace characters appear in
schema elements other than xs:appinfo or xs:documentation.
Only these 2 elements have mixed content; all others are element-only.
